tooltip.pvz.plant_card_info: [Plant Card] : Right click to summon plant
tooltip.pvz.doom_shroom_card: This plant will severely destroy blocks, especially above the surface !
tooltip.pvz.cob_cannon_card: Can only place on 2 nearby §nKernel Pult§r
tooltip.pvz.gold_leaf_card: Can only place on gold block or gold tiles !
tooltip.pvz.imitater_card.enjoy_card: Can not use, but it can level up for random plants on Essence Altar
tooltip.pvz.imitater_card.empty: right click imitater card while holding with left hand to open imitate gui
tooltip.pvz.pea_gun: Long press the right button of the mouse to shoot when on main hand, off hand to open gui
tooltip.pvz.resource_collector.use: Right click to collect single resource, click while shifting to range collect
tooltip.pvz.resource_collector.info: Single collect distance is %d blocks, range collect distance is %d blocks
tooltip.pvz.bowling_glove.empty: Right click WallNut or other Bowling Plants to use
tooltip.pvz.sun_storage_sapling.use: Place in §nSun Converter§r to absorb sun, or right click to eat it
tooltip.pvz.sun_storage_sapling.once: Only use once, can not absorb sun any more
tooltip.pvz.fragment_splice: A machine that can craft summon card by using enjoy cards
tooltip.pvz.card_fusion_table: A machine that can craft new kind of card by using several cards
tooltip.pvz.essence_altar: An altar used to enhance summon card
tooltip.pvz.origin_sword: Right click plants to use plant food
tooltip.pvz.origin_shovel: Right click plant to shovel it without consuming durability
tooltip.pvz.challenge_envelope1: Find a flat place and right click ground with it to start challenge
tooltip.pvz.challenge_envelope2: Left hold to see the challenge info, right hold to open envelope
tooltip.pvz.zombie_flag: Right Click to get a speed effect
tooltip.pvz.balloon: Right Click to get a slow fall effect
tooltip.pvz.zombie_doll: 持有该玩偶可以让蹦极僵尸
item.pvz.zombie_on_your_lawn.desc: Laura Shigihara - Zombies on your lawn
gui.pvz.pea_gun.tip1: Place a §aAppease Plant Card§r on the top slot to choose the shooting mode
gui.pvz.pea_gun.tip2: The rest slots can store different kinds of peas
gui.pvz.sun_converter.tip1: Nine slots can place §nsun storage sapling§r to absorb sun
gui.pvz.sun_converter.tip2: Or put items with §n sun mending §r enchantment to repair them
gui.pvz.slot_machine.tip1: When the mid row has at least two items the same, you will get rewards
gui.pvz.fragment_splice.tip1: The tips of using enjoy card to craft summon card are as follow :
gui.pvz.fragment_splice.tip2: Place 16 enjoy cards of certain plant at the out slots
gui.pvz.fragment_splice.tip3: Place 8 essences of certain plant at the mid slots
gui.pvz.fragment_splice.tip4: Place 1 template of certain plant at the inner slot
gui.pvz.card_fusion_table.tip1: It need the power of both sun and essence to run
gui.pvz.card_fusion_table.tip2: put sun storage sapling on left side bar
gui.pvz.card_fusion_table.tip3: put any type of essence on right side bar
gui.pvz.card_pack.tip1: The top row is hot bar, only green slots are valid for you
gui.pvz.card_pack.tip2: Hot bar will display when you hold your summon cards
gui.pvz.card_pack.tip3: The slots below can store summon cards
gui.pvz.essence_altar.tip1: Place summon card at top left
gui.pvz.essence_altar.tip2: Follow the tips to fill the rest slots
gui.pvz.essence_altar.tip3: Each enhance need 4 rank materials and 4 essences
gui.pvz.dave_shop.title: Dave Shop
gui.pvz.sun_shop.title: Sun Shop
gui.pvz.penny_shop.title: Penny Shop
advancement.pvz.root.desc: install Plants vs Zombies mod and join in world
advancement.pvz.pea_holiday.desc: Use pea-gun to hurt a mob
advancement.pvz.first_plant.desc: Use Plant Card to place a plant
advancement.pvz.super_plant.desc: Make a plant eat plant food
advancement.pvz.tooth.desc: Shoot target arrow to attack enemy
advancement.pvz.spudow.desc: use potato mine kill a zombie
advancement.pvz.disco.desc: Use Hypno Shroom to charm a Dancing Zombie
advancement.pvz.frozen.desc: Freeze 20 Zombies with a single Iceberg Lettuce or Ice Shroom
advancement.pvz.good_morning.desc: Use Coffee Bean to wake up 4 sleeping plants
advancement.pvz.popcorn.desc: Use One Cob Cannon to kill 2 Gargantuar or Giga Gargantuar
advancement.pvz.sun_storage.desc: Get a sun storage sapling with 10000 sun
command.pvz.invasion.assist: It's a assist invasion, can not be add
command.pvz.invasion.spawn: It's a spawn invasion, can not be add
command.pvz.challenge.exist: There already exist a challenge nearby
invasion.pvz.huge_wave: Huge Wave of enemies are coming !
help.pvz.upgrade: Advance Plants can only place on Corresponding plants !
help.pvz.ground: It's not allowed to place here !
help.pvz.outer: It can only place on other plants !
help.pvz.outer_full: Can not place on this plant !
help.pvz.sun: Sun is not enough, need %d sun !
help.pvz.bowling_glove.empty: No bowling, try to pick up one by right click entity with this item
help.pvz.bowling_glove.fail: It's not a bowling entity, can not be pick up
help.pvz.wrong_challenge: Create Fail, confirm the correct dimension
enchantment.pvz.sun_cost_reduce.desc: Reduce sun cost of summon cards
enchantment.pvz.break_out.desc: plants have chance to be super when summon
enchantment.pvz.energy_transfer.desc: Use swords right click plants to use plant food
enchantment.pvz.tree_protection.desc: Make received damage not higher than its max health
enchantment.pvz.charm.desc: Living summon by card will be charmed
enchantment.pvz.sun_shovel.desc: Plants will drop sun when being shoveled
enchantment.pvz.soilless_plant.desc: Make plants able to live on land independently
enchantment.pvz.level_up.desc: Living summon by card will have chance to have higher level
enchantment.pvz.immediate_cd.desc: Summon cards have chance to instant cool down(1 second)
enchantment.pvz.densely_plant.desc: Allow to place more plants in an area
enchantment.pvz.range_reach.desc: Add more range to some range tools
enchantment.pvz.bandage.desc: Use summon card to heal creature summoned
death.attack.pvz.pea: %s was shot to death by pea
death.attack.pvz.snow_pea: %s was frozen to death by snow pea
death.attack.pvz.flame_pea: %s was burn to death by flame pea
death.attack.pvz.spore: %s was shot to death by spore
death.attack.pvz.fume: %s was shot through the body by fume
death.attack.pvz.cabbage: %s was smashed to death by cabbage
death.attack.pvz.kernel: %s was smashed to death by kernel
death.attack.pvz.butter: %s was choked to death by butter
death.attack.pvz.melon: %s was smashed to death by melon
death.attack.pvz.winter_melon: %s was frozen to death by winter melon
death.attack.pvz.ball: %s was smashed to death by ball
gui.pvz.guide_info: Welcome to the world of Plants vs. Zombies, this book will take you through this mod.
gui.pvz.plants_info: This almanac will show you information of all plants in Plants vs Zombies mod.
gui.pvz.zombies_info: This almanac will show you information of all zombies in Plants vs Zombies mod.
skill.pvz.fast_cd.desc: Decrease the CD of summon card
skill.pvz.less_sun.desc: Decrease the sun cost of summon card
skill.pvz.ten_stars.desc: Increase the chance to shoot ten stars
skill.pvz.tough_body.desc: Zombies will gain more health point
challenge.pvz.title: Challenge
challenge.pvz.too_far_away: Please return to challenge place right now, or it will be remove soon
challenge.pvz.strange_help.name: Strange Help
challenge.pvz.strange_help.msg1: Help for Plants vs Zombies mod
challenge.pvz.strange_help.msg3: you no need to worry about that,
challenge.pvz.strange_help.msg4: just stand there and do nothing.
challenge.pvz.strange_help.msg5: You win when they eat your brain!

challenge.pvz.grass_day.msg3: We are about to launch an
challenge.pvz.grass_night.name: Grass Night
challenge.pvz.grass_night.msg2: we would like to visit for a
challenge.pvz.pool_day.name: Pool Day
challenge.pvz.pool_day.msg2: we heard you were having a
challenge.pvz.pool_day.msg3: pool party. We think that is fun.
challenge.pvz.pool_night.name: Pool Night
challenge.pvz.pool_night.msg3: Please come over to my house for
challenge.pvz.pool_night.msg4: meatloaf. Leave your front door open
challenge.pvz.newspaper.name: Newspaper
challenge.pvz.newspaper.msg2: The Brother of our King died yesterday
challenge.pvz.newspaper.msg3: As nobility, he got special ceremony
challenge.pvz.newspaper.msg4: Four zombie heave the coffin while walking
challenge.pvz.newspaper.msg5: Then he may have the chance to respawn
challenge.pvz.jump_jump_jump.name: Jump!Jump!Jump!
challenge.pvz.surrounded.name: Surrounded
challenge.pvz.roof_day.name: Roof Day
challenge.pvz.roof_day.msg3: We gonna launch an huge attack again,
challenge.pvz.roof_day.msg4: Please don't be ignorant to resistance
challenge.pvz.roof_night.name: Roof Night
challenge.pvz.roof_night.msg2: you have failed to submit to our rightful
challenge.pvz.roof_night.msg3: claim. Be advised that unless you comply
challenge.pvz.roof_night.msg4: we will be forced to take extreme action
challenge.pvz.roof_night.msg5: Please remit your brains to us forthwith.
challenge.pvz.roof_again.name: Roof Again
